A two-tier wedding cake decorated with mini pink tiles.
A two-tier christening cake decorated with hand-painted characters from Beatrix Potter.
A tall single tier cake decorated with handpainted flowers
A spherical cake covered in fondant and hand-painted to resemble BB8 from Star Wars.
A beach inspired cake featuring a fondant dog, puffin, beach-huts, and bunting.

node.altText: A tall single tier cake decorated with handpainted characters from Winnie the Pooh.

A yellow digger shaped birthday cake.

node.altText: A tall round cake with Hokusai's famous wave painted on around the circumference.
A modern 3-tier wedding cake featuring gold geometric stripes and marble effect tiles
A round cake with an impressionist style design inspired by Monet's Water Lilie's painted on the entire surface. Next to the cake is a fondant water-lily and mini footbridge.
A green cake with a fondant motorbike and motorcyclist placed on top.
A cake shaped like a large grey rock with a group of penguins huddled on-top. The rock is surrounded by a sea of blue-tinted buttercream"
A fondant covered cake shaped like a graduation cap.
A two-tier birthday cake featuring the Peppa Pig family, 3D trees, clouds, and a sun.
A four-tier semi-naked buttercream wedding cake decorated with flowers, fruit and dark chocolate
A very large cake shaped like Tigger balancing on his tail. Tigger is also holding a mini white-fondant cake.
A two tier fondant covered cake themed around the lion guard.
A round cake decorated with mini fondant woodland animals gathered around a pond with mini flowers, rocks, toadstools, and ivy. Animals include a squirrel, a fox and a hedgehog.
